TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BinaryExchange extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the contents of a WS-Trust BinaryExchange element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about the element that this class represents, see the version of the WS-Trust specification that applies to your scenario.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(unsigned int8[] binaryData, class System.Uri valueType) cil managed

Docs.param: A that represents the value type of the binary data.
Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with the specified data and ValueType URI.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following table shows the initial property values for the new instance.
|Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.BinaryExchange.BinaryData%2A>|The specified binary data.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.BinaryExchange.EncodingType%2A>|A <xref:System.Uri> based on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.WSSecurity10Constants.EncodingTypes.Base64> constant.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.BinaryExchange.ValueType%2A>|The specified value type <xref:System.Uri>.|

A that specifies the encoding type to be used for encoding the binary data.

Docs.summary: Gets the binary data associated with the BinaryExchange element.
Docs.value: An array of that contains the binary data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property returns the value of the BinaryExchange element.

Docs.value: A that contains the encoding type. This is the value of the EncodingType attribute of the BinaryExchange element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Specifies the type of encoding used to encode the binary data contained in the element.

Docs.value: A that contains the value type. This is the value of the ValueType attribute of the BinaryExchange element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Specifies the type of the binary data contained in the element.
